main event: Two peculiar lights traveled from the east to the southwest and disappeared.
interesting points: The lights were bright red in color at first,The object appeared to change colors to red, white, and green,The sighting lasted approximately 2 minutes,There were inconsistencies in reports from college students on the same date,No photographs or physical evidence were recorded.
sighted object: two lights changing colors in the sky
witness description: Civilian individuals including a father and his two daughters.
